product.title: Mickey and Goofy’s Race Around the World | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Mickey and Goofy’s Race Around
the World

Young readers will embark on a flight of fancy as they join Mickey and Goofy in a hot-air balloon race around the world in this delightful Disney classic. When Mickey and Goofy join the hot-air balloon race, they envision smooth skies ahead—but their air travel soon turns harrowing as they encounter unexpected twists and turns on their voyage.

Tie-in Activity: Use a map of the world or a globe to retrace Mickey and Goofy’s route. Point out points of interest, such as the equator, North and South Poles, oceans, and your home state.
